name: Eastern Mediterranean University
description:
Established in 1979, Eastern Mediterranean University (EMU) is a state university offering internationally recognized undergraduate and graduate degree programs in 10 faculties and 4 schools to around 13.000 students from 68 different countries with 1000 faculty members from 35 countries. English is the medium of instruction and the students are given an opportunity to learn English at EMU English Preparatory School. 

Giving importance to research and academic studies, Eastern Mediterranean University has publications in more than one thousand international indexed journals. Numerous international academic and cultural conferences/workshops are organized throughout the year. The University boasts more than 30 research centers and a modern library housing more than 140.000 books and more than 820 periodicals with comfortable study areas and easy on-line access to sources around the world. The University has collaborations with more than 150 institutions of higher education from all over the world.

In EMU, the faculty member to student ratio is 1:13. The faculty members have close contact with students.  There is a strong university, parent and student collaboration.

Along with high quality education, Eastern Mediterranean University offers modern and smart classrooms, laboratories and highly efficient computer and internet connections.
